item.description: ğŸš¨ BREAKING: In a JAW-DROPPING revelation, HUD Sec. Scott Turner just found over $5 BILLION in potential FRAUDULENT payments for thousands of non-citizens and deceased people Up to 30,000 THOUSAND of them. A "large concentration" of these rental assistance payments went to BLUE jurisdictions: New York, California and DC, per the New York Post CANCEL AND CLAW BACK ALL OF IT! â€œA massive abuse of taxpayer dollars not only occurred under President Bidenâ€™s watch, but was effectively incentivized by his administrationâ€™s failure to implement strong financial controls resulting in billions worth of potential improper payments." Here's Scott Turner a few weeks ago confirming a MASSIVE betrayal under Biden: Illegals were getting taxpayer-backed MORTGAGES over US citizens. All of it needs to be canceled and people need to go to jail.

item.title: @elonmusk: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ ELON: GOVERNMENT WAS WASTING TAXPAYER MONEY ON "TRANSGENDER ANIMAL SURGERIES" Elon cited official...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ ELON: GOVERNMENT WAS WASTING TAXPAYER MONEY ON "TRANSGENDER ANIMAL SURGERIES" Elon cited official government audits documenting massive federal waste while running DOGE, calling out absurd expenditures including taxpayer-funded transgender procedures for animals: "If you look at the Inspector General reports and the Government Accountability Office, there have been many audits that pointed out a tremendous amount of waste and fraud in the government. There was a report issued by the GAO last year under the Biden administration. We're trying to get that number down to a much smaller figure, save money for the American taxpayer, stop money being spent on things that very few taxpayers would agree make sense. Transgender animal surgeries. Why are American tax dollars being spent on this?" Source:@elonmusk/ Fox

item.title: @elonmusk: BREAKING: Iâ€™m calling for the denaturalization and deportation of every Somali engaged in fraud in M...
item.description: BREAKING: Iâ€™m calling for the denaturalization and deportation of every Somali engaged in fraud in Minnesota. Read my full statement below: â€œI have three words regarding Somalis who have committed fraud against American taxpayers: Send them home. If theyâ€™re here illegally, deport them immediately; if theyâ€™re naturalized citizens, revoke their citizenship and deport them quickly thereafter. If we need to change the law to do that, I will. Our nation will not tolerate those who take advantage of our charity and refuse to assimilate into our culture. Additionally, if any naturalized Somalis had undisclosed ties to terrorist organizations like Al-Shabaab, I want to see their citizenship revoked and their asses sent back immediately. Same goes for anyone who is found to have committed marriage fraud during the immigration process.â€
